mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member m, position p WHERE m_num = #{m_num} AND m.po_num = p.po_num

SELECT r.m_num as requester_num, dm.m_num as manager_num , r.re_time, dm.d_m_number, m.m_name as requester_name, a.m_name as manager_name, r.re_location_x, r.re_location_y FROM member m, request r, drone_mission dm , (select a.m_name from member a, drone_mission b where a.m_num = b.m_num) a WHERE m.m_num = r.m_num AND r.re_num = dm.re_num Order by r.re_time desc
